report.title: FIT Counts
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values hab_sav on hab_sav.sample_id = csf.id AND hab_sav.sample_attribute_id = #habitat_smp_id# AND hab_sav.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms hab_term on hab_term.id = hab_sav.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values target_sav on target_sav.sample_id = csf.id AND hab_sav.sample_attribute_id = #target_smp_id# AND target_sav.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms target_term on target_term.id = target_sav.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = csf.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav on oav.occurrence_id = cof.id AND occurrence_attribute_id = #insect_abund_occ_id# AND oav.deleted = false #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND csf.website_id in (#website_ids#) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST('#year#' || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST('#year#' || '-12-31' as date)))

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

param.name: habitat_smp_id
param.description: ID of sample attribute that holds the habitat.

param.name: target_smp_id
param.description: ID of sample attribute that holds the target flower.

param.name: insect_abund_occ_id
param.description: ID of occurrence attribute that holds abundances of the insects.

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years
